TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CarrierMessagingService extends Android.App.Service

Docs.summary: A service that receives calls from the system when new SMS and MMS are sent or received.

remarks.para: A service that receives calls from the system when new SMS and MMS are sent or received.

To extend this class, you must declare the service in your manifest file with the android.Manifest.permission#BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES permission and include an intent filter with the #SERVICE_INTERFACE action. For example:
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnDownloadMms (Android.Net.Uri contentUri, int subId, Android.Net.Uri location, Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService.IResultCallback callback);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDownloadMms(class Android.Net.Uri contentUri, int32 subId, class Android.Net.Uri location, class Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService/IResultCallback callback) cil managed

abstract member OnDownloadMms : Android.Net.Uri * int * Android.Net.Uri * Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService.IResultCallback -> unit override this.OnDownloadMms : Android.Net.Uri * int * Android.Net.Uri * Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService.IResultCallback -> unit

Docs.param: the content provider URI of the PDU to be downloaded.
SMS subscription ID of the SIM
the URI of the message to be downloaded.
result callback. Call with a status code which is one of #DOWNLOAD_STATUS_OK, #DOWNLOAD_STATUS_RETRY_ON_CARRIER_NETWORK, or #DOWNLOAD_STATUS_ERROR.
Docs.summary: Override this method to download MMSs received.

format.a: Java documentation for android.service.carrier.CarrierMessagingService.onDownloadMms(android.net.Uri, int, android.net.Uri, android.service.carrier.ResultCallback).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnFilterSms (Android.Service.Carrier.MessagePdu pdu, string format, int destPort, int subId, Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService.IResultCallback callback);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnFilterSms(class Android.Service.Carrier.MessagePdu pdu, string format, int32 destPort, int32 subId, class Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService/IResultCallback callback) cil managed

abstract member OnFilterSms : Android.Service.Carrier.MessagePdu * string * int * int * Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService.IResultCallback -> unit override this.OnFilterSms : Android.Service.Carrier.MessagePdu * string * int * int * Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService.IResultCallback -> unit

Docs.param: the PDUs of the message
the format of the PDUs, typically "3gpp" or "3gpp2"
the destination port of a binary SMS, this will be -1 for text SMS
SMS subscription ID of the SIM
result callback. Call with true to keep an inbound SMS message and deliver to SMS apps, and false to drop the message.
Docs.summary: Override this method to filter inbound SMS messages.

format.a: Java documentation for android.service.carrier.CarrierMessagingService.onFilterSms(android.service.carrier.MessagePdu, java.lang.String, int, int, android.service.carrier.ResultCallback).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnReceiveTextSms (Android.Service.Carrier.MessagePdu pdu, string format, int destPort, int subId, Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService.IResultCallback callback);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnReceiveTextSms(class Android.Service.Carrier.MessagePdu pdu, string format, int32 destPort, int32 subId, class Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService/IResultCallback callback) cil managed

abstract member OnReceiveTextSms : Android.Service.Carrier.MessagePdu * string * int * int * Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService.IResultCallback -> unit override this.OnReceiveTextSms : Android.Service.Carrier.MessagePdu * string * int * int * Android.Service.Carrier.CarrierMessagingService.IResultCallback -> unit

Docs.param: the PDUs of the message
the format of the PDUs, typically "3gpp" or "3gpp2"
the destination port of a binary SMS, this will be -1 for text SMS
SMS subscription ID of the SIM

result callback. Call with a bitmask integer to indicate how the incoming text SMS should be handled by the platform. Use #RECEIVE_OPTIONS_DROP and #RECEIVE_OPTIONS_SKIP_NOTIFY_WHEN_CREDENTIAL_PROTECTED_STORAGE_UNAVAILABLE to set the flags in the bitmask.
Docs.summary: Override this method to filter inbound SMS messages.

format.a: Java documentation for android.service.carrier.CarrierMessagingService.onReceiveTextSms(android.service.carrier.MessagePdu, java.lang.String, int, int, android.service.carrier.ResultCallback).

phone number of the recipient of the message

Docs.param: the binary content
SMS subscription ID of the SIM
phone number of the recipient of the message
the destination port
Flag for sending SMS. Acceptable values are 0 and #SEND_FLAG_REQUEST_DELIVERY_STATUS.
result callback. Call with a SendSmsResult.
Docs.summary: Override this method to intercept binary SMSs sent from the device.

Docs.summary: Used to set the flag in the bitmask passed to the callback of #onReceiveTextSms to indicate that a new message notification should not be shown to the user when the credential-encrypted storage of the device is not available before the user unlocks the phone.

remarks.para: Used to set the flag in the bitmask passed to the callback of #onReceiveTextSms to indicate that a new message notification should not be shown to the user when the credential-encrypted storage of the device is not available before the user unlocks the phone. It is only applicable to devices that support file-based encryption.
